definition: to take strict precautions/on your guard
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: Beware of insincere friends around you.
sentences.chinese: 嚴防在您周圍虛假的朋友。

sentences.english: In the days to come, we shall guard against international terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 在接下來的日子裏，我們要嚴防恐怖分子。

sentences.english: He's a top player so we're going to have to be on our guard.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位頂級球員，我們必須嚴防死守。

sentences.english: The real solution is to punish teams that overcommit to stopping Yao.
sentences.chinese: 真正實際的解決辦法是懲罰嚴防死守姚明的球隊。

sentences.english: Cable transportation shall ensure that the package is in good, defend mechanical collision.
sentences.chinese: 電纜運輸應確保包裝完好，嚴防機械碰傷。

sentences.english: Officials warned nearby residents to protect themselves against the rain of ashes that the eruption will likely cause.
sentences.chinese: 官方警告周圍居民嚴防火山爆發後掉落的火山灰。
